job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-31T07:11:24.000Z", "description": "Senior Software Developer

Direct Hire- 100% Remote

ARC Group is currently looking for a Senior Software Developer with experience in Full-Stack & Cloud. This opportunity is with a client of ours that has impressive growth in the Digital Media industry. The department location for this opportunity is in New York City & Boston, MA but you can be located at your home office as this role is 100% Remote.

Our client offers excellent benefits, a competitive salary, and a good work-life balance. This role is 100% remote even after the pandemic is over. This is a direct-hire (permanent hire): Being so, candidates must be eligible to work for any employer without sponsorship now or in the future. No third parties.

Essential Duties:
  • Collaborative design and implementation of modern user-friendly interfaces
  • Creation of tests (Unit, UI, ...) and documentation
  • Active participation in the implementation and operation (e.g. troubleshooting) of new cloud-based services
  • Active participation in building and improving our continuous integration and deployment processes
  • Participation (virtual or in-person) in planning meetings for coordination between the Scrum teams

Required Experience:
  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, MIS, or a related field required. Equivalent work experience in a similar position may be substituted for educational requirements.
  • Minimum five years increasingly responsible software design and implementation experience using a standard coding language and/or platform required
  • Expert (recognized authority) in developing and creating tests with Python (3.X)
  • Advanced experience (practical application and applied theory) in at least one other programming language (PHP 7 and newer, C #, Golang)
  • Practical experience in the application of agile methodologies (e.g. Scrum or XP)
  • Intermediate experience (practical application) in developing online services and building APIs
  • Intermediate experience (practical application) in using NoSQL and relational databases is desirable
  • Intermediate experience (practical application) in application development in the FaaS / serverless environment is desirable
  • Intermediate experience (practical application) in the area of development with / integration of authentication and authorization/solutions/protocols is desirable
